name: CodeWave
tagline: CodeWave simple and intuitive PHP5 MVC framework
body:
# Welcome to the official micro site of the project
CodeWave is small and simple PHP 5.3+ framework, designed with minimalism in mind right from the beginning. 

CI Server info: [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/DaGhostman/codewave.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/DaGhostman/codewave) [![Coverage Status](https://coveralls.io/repos/phpAcorn/wave-framework/badge.png?branch=master)](https://coveralls.io/r/phpAcorn/wave-framework?branch=master) [![License](https://poser.pugx.org/wave/wave/license.svg)](https://packagist.org/packages/wave/wave) 

Latest Stable: [![Latest Stable Version](https://poser.pugx.org/wave/wave/v/stable.svg)](https://packagist.org/packages/wave/wave) 

Latest Dev: [![Latest Unstable Version](https://poser.pugx.org/wave/wave/v/unstable.svg)](https://packagist.org/packages/wave/wave)
